snippet: Adam Silver, the commissioner of the National Basketball Association, said that with an estimated $400 billion of sports betting already taking place in the United States, it should be regulated.
abstract: Adam Silver, the commissioner of the National Basketball Association, said that with an estimated $400 billion of sports betting already taking place in the United States, it should be regulated.
lead_paragraph: The commissioner of the National Basketball Association, Adam Silver, on Thursday reasserted his position that sports betting in the United States should be legalized at a federal level.

headline.main: N.B.A. Commissioner Reiterates Support for Legal Wagering
